title: The Income Evidence schema
description: Information About an Income Evidence Item

id.description: The ID of the income evidence item associated with the financial assessment

dateReceived.description: The date the evidence was received

mandatory.description: Indicates whether the evidence is mandatory

applicantId.description: The ID of the person associated with the income evidence (applicant or partner)

otherText.description: The evidence description (required for certain evidence types)

adhoc.description: Indicates who the other adhoc evidence is associated with (applicant or partner)
